languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс медлит еще мгновение — и его руки {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ложатся на рубильники{/d} когитатора.{/n} "Я ускорю процесс. Так, чтобы все закончилось как можно быстрее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс медлит еще мгновение — и его руки ложатся на рубильники когитатора.{/n} "Я ускорю процесс. Так, чтобы все закончилось как можно быстрее".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}come to rest on the cogitator's switches{/d}.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс медлит еще мгновение — и его руки {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ложатся на рубильники{/d} когитатора.{/n} "Я ускорю процесс. Так, чтобы все закончилось как можно быстрее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands come to rest on the cogitator's switches.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands come to rest on the cogitator's switches.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands come to rest on the cogitator's switches.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands come to rest on the cogitator's switches.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希又犹豫了一会儿，他的手{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}放在了沉思者的开关上{/d}。{/n}“我准备加快这个过程。这样一来，一切就会尽快结束了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}come to rest on the cogitator's switches{/d}.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希又犹豫了一会儿，他的手放在了思考器的开关上。{/n}“我准备加快这个过程。这样一来，一切就会尽快结束了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vacila durante un segundo más antes de {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}colocar las manos sobre los interruptores del cogitador{/d}.{/n} «Aceleraré el proceso. Así acabará lo antes posible».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}come to rest on the cogitator's switches{/d}.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vacila durante un segundo más antes de colocar las manos sobre los interruptores del cogitador.{/n} «Aceleraré el proceso. Así acabará lo antes posible».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはまたしばらく迷い…その手を{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}考算機のスイッチにかけた{/d}。{/n}「プロセスを加速させましょう。できるだけ早くすべてが終わるように」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}come to rest on the cogitator's switches{/d}.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはまたしばらく迷い…その手を{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}考算機のスイッチにかけた{/d}。{/n}「プロセスを加速させましょう。できるだけ早くすべてが終わるように」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schwankt noch einen Moment – und dann {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}legt er seine Hände auf die Schalter des Cogitators{/d}.{/n} "Ich werde den Prozess beschleunigen. Damit alles möglichst schnell vorbei ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}come to rest on the cogitator's switches{/d}.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schwankt noch einen Moment – und dann legt er seine Hände auf die Schalter des Cogitators.{/n} "Ich werde den Prozess beschleunigen. Damit alles möglichst schnell vorbei ist."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hésite encore un instant, puis ses mains {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}se posent sur les interrupteurs du cogitateur{/d}.{/n} « Je vais accélérer le processus, pour que tout se termine dès que possible. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}come to rest on the cogitator's switches{/d}.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hésite encore un instant, puis ses mains se posent sur les interrupteurs du cogitateur.{/n} « Je vais accélérer le processus, pour que tout se termine dès que possible. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bir müddet daha sendeledikten sonra Heinrix, ellerini {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}kavramsayarın düğmelerine koyuyor{/d}.{/n} "Her şey bir an önce son bulsun diye işlemi hızlandıracağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix vacillates for another moment — and his hands {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}come to rest on the cogitator's switches{/d}.{/n} "I will accelerate the process. So that everything is over as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir müddet daha sendeledikten sonra Heinrix, ellerini kavramsayarın düğmelerine koyuyor.{/n} “İşlemi hızlandıracağım. Her şey bir an önce son bulsun diye.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
